mimodek.tracking
Class TrackingSimulator

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      mimodek.tracking.TrackingSimulator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class TrackingSimulator
extends java.lang.Thread

A simple tracking simulator for development and testing purpose. It runs as a thread. Double click to create/remove a tracking object (a little square). Click and drag to move squares around. Click on a square to make it inactive (empty square), moving it won't produce tracking info. Click again on an empty square to make it active. Move the squares in and out the tracking area to create tracking data. See MimodekSketch in the example folder for more info.

Author:
Jonsku
